alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:56PM MDT until June 20 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Northwestern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 615 PM MDT/715 PM CDT/. * At 456 PM MDT/556 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Cottonwood to 8 miles west of Kadoka to 2 miles northwest of George Town, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Intersection of Highway 73 and White River around 505 PM MDT. Philip and Kadoka around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Belvidere, Nowlin and Midland. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 141 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
